title: Since Manaflow Band is basically being reverted to Meditation why is it worse than meditation was?
body:
10% missing mana per 60 seconds = 0.83% missing mana per 5 seconds. 

Meditation = flat 1.25% missing mana per 5 seconds. 

A number of other cunning runes returned in way stronger forms in the new rune system(Merciless, and Intelligence for example) so why is Meditation so much weaker than it was in old runes when it was clearly one of the least problematic runes?
